sentences.sentence: Any change ought to require the general concurrence of all concerned.
sentences.translation: 任何改变都需要所有相关方的一致赞同。

sentences.sentence: The concurrence of their disappearances had to be more than coincidental.
sentences.translation: 他们一起消失应该不是巧合。

sentences.sentence: The doctor may seek the concurrence of a relative before carrying out the procedure.
sentences.translation: 医生可以征得亲属的同意后再施行此项手术。
